io.janusproject.kernel.services.hazelcast

Class HazelcastKernelDiscoveryService

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.google.common.util.concurrent.AbstractService
      • io.janusproject.services.AbstractDependentService
        • io.janusproject.kernel.services.hazelcast.HazelcastKernelDiscoveryService
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Service, AsyncStateService, DependentService, KernelDiscoveryService

    public class HazelcastKernelDiscoveryService
extends AbstractDependentService
implements KernelDiscoveryService, AsyncStateService
    Service that is providing the access to the repository of the Janus kernels.

    It uses the Hazelcast library for discovering the nodes over the network.

    Version:
    2.0.2.0 2015-04-09 09:04:05
    Author:
    Sebastian Rodriguez, Stéphane Galland
    Maven Group Id:
    io.janusproject
    Maven Artifact Id:
    io.janusproject.kernel

    • Method Detail

      • isReadyForOtherServices

        public boolean isReadyForOtherServices()
        Replies if the service is launched and ready for running.

        This functions differs from Service.isRunning(): this functions replies true if the service is running (similar to Service.isRunning()) AND the service considers it is redy to respond to other services.

        Specified by:
        isReadyForOtherServices in interface AsyncStateService
        Returns:
        true if ready.

      • getServiceDependencies

        public Collection<Class<? extends Service>> getServiceDependencies()
        Replies the services that must be launched BEFORE launching this service, and that must be stop AFTER stopping this service.

        If one of the dependencies is a AsyncStateService, this service will way until AsyncStateService.isReadyForOtherServices() is true.

        Specified by:
        getServiceDependencies in interface DependentService
        Overrides:
        getServiceDependencies in class AbstractDependentService
        Returns:
        the dependencies.
        See Also:
        DependentService.getServiceWeakDependencies()

      • getKernels

        public Collection<URI> getKernels()
        Replies the URIs of the kernels, including the current kernels.

        The replies collection must not be synchronized on the service.

        Specified by:
        getKernels in interface KernelDiscoveryService
        Returns:
        the uri of the kernels.
